title: Report warning for doing nothing
body:
Why is my behavior not in line with anyone else? It said that after a troll and a enemy who said report sivir for toxic and abuse and to cocky when I said nothing all game accept I said please report lee for intent feeding which he clearly was and he was 1/10 and I got a warning for verbal abuse? please tell me this is a joke riot.

I didnt even swear.

replies.body:
I had a look at some of your recent chat logs. You're swearing at team mates, abusing them and are generally being negative. There are times when your chat is OK, but you need to work on not being abusive.

I would use your period of being chat restricted to evaluate your behaviour and try to be positive towards your team mates.

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=elgki8e4,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-10-13T01:39:14.931+0000)
>
> I had a look at some of your recent chat logs. You're swearing at team mates, abusing them and are generally being negative. There are times when your chat is OK, but you need to work on not being abusive.
> 
> I would use your period of being chat restricted to evaluate your behaviour and try to be positive towards your team mates.

Sephyre can we play a game of league together, because I  haven't played a game with a  rioter yet. :P
you got rekt son. literally never gonna believe one of these "but rito i no say nutting" whingers again. kids are too used to complaining to the ref like sports lol
There's no such thing as no reason, just ignorance of reason. I 100% do not believe that you only said one thing all game (which is toxic in itself)
Sephyre, do I swear at team mates also? I'm unsure if my inner aussieness is coming out in games, can you check ? Flaming bronze mongrels :)

Sure!

I had a look at your most recent games. You're communicating what's going on in the game with your team - that's cool. Where there's probably some room for improvement is in how you do that.

You tend to ask people why they did something, often with lots of capitals - this can be negative. 

Most of your chat is ok, it just seems when you get stressed that you are a little more harsh towards your team, especially if they disagree with you. If you take a moment to see things from their point of view it might improve your team communication.

You also play a lot of Morgana - good choice :)

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=elgki8e4,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-10-13T02:35:19.737+0000)
> You also play a lot of Morgana - good choice :)

[How about this game then? )](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/107966087/201025528?tab=overview)

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=elgki8e4,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-10-13T02:35:19.737+0000)
>
> Sure!
> 
> I had a look at your most recent games. You're communicating what's going on in the game with your team - that's cool. Where there's probably some room for improvement is in how you do that.
> 
> You tend to ask people why they did something, often with lots of capitals - this can be negative. 
> 
> Most of your chat is ok, it just seems when you get stressed that you are a little more harsh towards your team, especially if they disagree with you. If you take a moment to see things from their point of view it might improve your team communication.
> 
> You also play a lot of Morgana - good choice :)

Thanks, will take on board )

welcome to the complete lack of maintainence displayed by one of the richest and laziest game companies in the world.

riot are making a killing off of just letting the game be as it is.. they barely do anything and its showing now.
AND I JUST JOINED MY LAST GAME AND I GOT A CHAT BAN? AND I GOT A REPORT FOR NO REASON YESTERDAY
